>>> import sys
>>> print("Python executable:", sys.executable)
Python executable: C:\Program Files\Python312\python.exe
>>> print("Base prefix:", sys.base_prefix)
Base prefix: C:\Program Files\Python312
>>> print("Running inside venv:", sys.base_prefix != sys.prefix)
Running inside venv: False
>>>
>>> import os
>>> import subprocess
>>>
>>> os.environ["PATH"] = os.popen('cmd /c "echo %PATH%"').read().strip()
>>>
>>> try:
...     output = subprocess.run(["gcloud", "--version"], check=True, capture_output=True, text=True)
...     print("✅ gcloud is working inside Python!", output.stdout)
... except FileNotFoundError:
...     print("❌ gcloud is still NOT found in Python.")
...
❌ gcloud is still NOT found in Python.
>>>
